tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  admission_date TIMESTAMP,
  discharge_date TIMESTAMP,
  outcome VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_health_data ( 
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_name STRING, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    health_status STRING, 
    diagnosis STRING 
)

CREATE TABLE report_analytics ( 
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT, 
    report_date DATE, 
    analysis_results STRING 
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  date_of_visit DATE
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
  score INT,
  assessment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_health_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  medication TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_lab_results (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE quality_assessment_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  metrics TEXT,
  outcome VARCHAR(20),
  recommendation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_health_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    doctor_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE doctor_information (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    clinic_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE hospital_facilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    services_provided TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE quality_assessment_data (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result VARCHAR(50),
    comments TEXT
)
